title: [UPDATE 4] **IT'S TOMORROW!**OCE 1v1 Tournament! 11th of January, OPEN TO ALL!
body:
Hey!

Tomorrow we kick off the largest 1v1 tournament ever in OCE at twitch.tv/tbtv_mysticnz! (64 entries!)

If you have entered the tournament make sure you are in the "mysticnz" chatroom 30mintues prior to the start of the tournament!

If you are not in the tournament then join the stream! Giving away RP after EVERY round and PIZZA to get delivered to your house free too!!

**START TIMES**:
1pm NZT
11am AEST
10am QLD

Stream will be live *atleast* 30mintues before the first match.

Come join! Support your friends and win free stuff!

-MysticNZ

http://twitch.tv/tbtv_mysticnz

_______

Any questions message me on here or flick me a message on facebook.com/mysticnz

replies.body: Yea didn't realize QLD was an hour behind. Should be a fun day if everyone shows up :)

omfg. 10 o'clock geeegeee
i'll have too sleep at like 7
You expect people to be awake at 10am? Rofl.
